duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide operational and logistical support to the Market President and Director of Human Resources, facilitating key strategic and operational meetings.
Research and accumulate relevant data for strategic initiatives and best practices, and support managers, supervisors, and directors across both hospitals.
Assist in administrative, financial, and operational duties for respective departments, and educate on technology, process improvement, and project management.
Prepare and present key operational reports, initiate reminders and attend meetings to take minutes of the session.
Conduct ongoing research in workforce, innovation, business, and regulatory trends to provide intelligence and data support for operational and logistical tactics.
Plan, lead, and execute projects, evaluate and execute performance improvement initiatives, and provide data analysis of key operational and strategic initiatives.
Collaborate with talent acquisition team and physicians, and provide timely follow-up with all requests.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in healthcare administration, business, or related discipline required. Master’s degree preferred.
